message: This is my initial offer. I propose we split the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you.
I'm willing to give you more, but I'm not going to give you all of it. You can do better than this.
I've adjusted my offer based on the inflation. This time, I propose we split the money 650000 for me and 350000 for you.
You're getting closer, but I'm still not willing to give you the majority. Meet me in the middle!
